event.description: Devon Travis strikes out swinging.
Josh Donaldson strikes out swinging.
Jose Bautista strikes out swinging.
Kendrys Morales flies out sharply to left fielder Joey Rickard.
Troy Tulowitzki pops out to shortstop J. Hardy.
Russell Martin grounds out, third baseman Manny Machado to first baseman Chris Davis.
Steve Pearce pops out to second baseman Jonathan Schoop.
Justin Smoak singles on a line drive to left fielder Joey Rickard.
Kevin Pillar singles on a line drive to center fielder Adam Jones. Justin Smoak to 2nd.
Devon Travis singles on a line drive to right fielder Trey Mancini. Justin Smoak scores. Kevin Pillar to 3rd on the throw.
Josh Donaldson called out on strikes.
Jose Bautista lines out sharply to first baseman Chris Davis.
Kendrys Morales grounds out, second baseman Jonathan Schoop to first baseman Chris Davis.

Defensive Substitution: Craig Gentry replaces right fielder Trey Mancini, batting 6th, playing right field.
Pitching Change: Brad Brach replaces Dylan Bundy.
Justin Smoak hits a ground-rule double (1) on a line drive down the left-field line.
Kevin Pillar pops out to catcher Welington Castillo in foul territory.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Ezequiel Carrera replaces Justin Smoak.
With Josh Donaldson batting, wild pitch by Brad Brach, Ezequiel Carrera to 3rd.

Pitching Change: Zach Britton replaces Brad Brach.

Russell Martin walks. Jose Bautista to 3rd. Ryan Goins to 2nd.
